channel.title: Assembly on University of Toronto Autonomous Drone Racing Team
channel.description: Recent content in Assembly on University of Toronto Autonomous Drone Racing Team

item.title: ADR Advances in Abu Dhabi: Qualifying for the Autonomous Drone Challenge
item.description: Over the past two weeks, the ADR competition team has taken a major step forward, participating in the 3rd round of qualifications for the A2RL x DCL - Drone Champions League Autonomous Drone Challenge in Abu Dhabi!

item.title: ADR Racing Gates
item.description: We built the custom ordered ADR racing gates for future drone tests! In addition, we collected images of the gates for training our gate detection algorithm.

item.title: Paper Submission to ICRA2024
item.description: We submit a paper about our new algorithm on time-optimal trajectory planning for autonomous drone racing.
